limitations: GitHub token (GH_TOKEN/GITHUB_TOKEN) not available in runtime environment
gh-aw binary not built or accessible (requires Go and make)
Unable to query GitHub Actions API for workflow run metrics
Unable to use gh aw logs tool for detailed workflow execution data

ecosystem.note: Runtime metrics (runs, success rates, safe outputs, tokens, costs) require GitHub API access and gh-aw binary

recommendations: Ensure GH_TOKEN or GITHUB_TOKEN is set in workflow environment
Pre-build gh-aw binary or ensure Go toolchain is available
Provide GitHub MCP server configuration for API access
Consider running metrics collector in environment with full tooling
